channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [SBG6][Virtual Private Servers] - Internal databases update
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 18, 09:00 - 15:00 UTC

Feb 19, 00:19 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled for update the Internal databases on SBG6.

Start time : 18/03/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 18/03/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a Virtual Private Servers service maintenance.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 07:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 7, 04:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 17/03/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/03/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E101 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack E101 to racks E103 and E105.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 06B05
item.description:
Feb 24, 06:37 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the 06B05.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 24/2/2025 5:55 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Servers in the rack 06B05 were no longer responding.
Customers Impact : Customers can not acces to their servers
Root Cause : This incident is/was caused by a electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. 

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX4][Bare Metal Cloud] - Rack 56A19
item.description:
Feb 23, 05:59 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that we had an incident on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.
This incident has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 23/02/2025 05:35 UTC
End time : 23/02/2025 05:38 UTC
Impacted Service : All servers in the rack 56A19 were no longer responding.
Customers Impact : Availability has been affected by this incident.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

item.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R809R07 / R809R08 / R809R09
item.description:
Feb 21, 18:18 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on racks R809R07 / R809R08 / R809R09 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 21/02/2025 17:23 UTC
End time : 21/02/2025 18:07 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 21, 17:55 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : All servers on the rack R809R07 are available, there are still servers unavailable on R809R8 and R809R09.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 21, 17:38 UTC
Update - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary Availability issues in the rack R809R08.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 21/02/2025 17:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers are currently unavailable.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. 

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 21, 17:29 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Dedicated Servers offer.

Start time : 21/02/2025 17:23 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
